duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in building, optimizing, and maintaining data pipelines and developing data models and architecture.
Participate in the building, management, and implementation of data and Big Data pipeline capabilities.
Analyze information to determine business needs and implement technical solutions.
Take a new perspective on existing solutions to solve problems of low to moderate complexity.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree and two years of experience in systems engineering or administration or equivalent education and related training or experience
